Topic.Title: All my games are marked as undefined

Posts.EditableText:
Is the server down? None of my games will download, all are broken. This is really bad, luckily, I have started working on most of my games on the desktop but some have never been downloaded.

I thought I could download them, but that was ipossible. It had a runtime error and I think the server is down. What's going on and how do I fix this?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi

Yes the server is down. Games run on a separate server to the web site, and I still do not have access to that server. Manowar has had a look, but could not resolve it yesterday; he hopefully will be able to look again this evening (EU time).

Sorry for the inconvenience to all!
